title: Francis Field (Illinois)
text:
Francis Field is a 2,000-seat <a href="American%20football%20field">football field</a> in <a href="Greenville%2C%20Illinois">Greenville, Illinois</a>. It is home to the <a href="Greenville%20College">Greenville College</a> Panthers <a href="American%20football">football</a> <a href="team">team</a>. The facility opened in 1987.
Francis Field has three times been the location of the <a href="National%20Christian%20College%20Athletic%20Association">National Christian College Athletic Association</a> <a href="Victory%20Bowl">Victory Bowl</a>, in <a href="2009%20Victory%20Bowl">2009</a>, in 2012, and in 2019.
